text: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi āraddhosmi bhikkhave imāya paṭipadāya āraddhacittosmi bhikkhave imāya paṭipadāya
edit: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi – āraddhosmi bhikkhave imāya paṭipadāya āraddhacittosmi bhikkhave imāya paṭipadāya

translations.transtext: Then the Blessed One, having looked over the monks' assembly, each of them [was] in a state of silence, addressed the monks thus, "Monks, I undertake [in] this line of pratice. Monks, I favor [in] this line of practice."
